data.title: Ghostbusters II DVD (1989) | Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd
data.meta_description: Details of Ghostbusters II DVD Release Date : June 16, 1989 Where To Watch : Apple Tv Starring : Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver
data.text:
Description

Synopsis of Ghostbusters II DVD

Five years after their triumphant yet messy victory that left New York City covered in gooey roasted marshmallows, the former heroes and once-celebrated ghost hunters find themselves struggling. Their credibility and status have waned, forcing them to take on odd jobs to make ends meet. The excitement and fame that once surrounded them have faded, leaving them to grapple with a mundane reality far removed from their former glory.

The situation takes a dramatic turn when Dana and her infant son experience a horrifying encounter with the paranormal. This incident reignites the Ghostbustersâ€™ purpose and calls them back into action. Peter Venkman and his dedicated team of supernatural crime fighters reunite, ready to tackle the new threat. The city needs them once again, and they must rise to the occasion, facing the dangers that loom large over New York. The threat is more sinister this time.

Rivers of psycho-reactive ectoplasm surge beneath the city, and the malevolent spirit of sixteenth-century tyrant Vigo the Carpathian emerges, intent on plunging New York into darkness. The Ghostbusters must rally their courage and expertise to confront this ancient evil. As they prepare for their most challenging battle yet, the world watches and wonders if the Ghostbusters can save humanity once more. Are we ready to believe in them again? The fate of the city, and perhaps the world, hangs in the balance.

You can watch the trailer of Ghostbusters II DVD here
